subject: Climate & Environment
title: Glacial Lake Outburst Floods
description: One-minute skill: Glacial Lake Outburst Floods.

hook.text: As glaciers melt, they leave behind lakes dammed by loose rocks and ice. These dams can burst.

buildup.text: A glacial lake outburst flood unleashes millions of cubic meters of water in minutes.

discovery.text: Nepal, Peru, and Bhutan face growing risk as warming creates thousands of new glacial lakes.

twist.text: These floods can travel over 100 kilometers downstream, destroying everything in their path.

climax.text: Early warning systems and artificial lake drainage can prevent disasters before dams fail.

punchline.text: Melting glaciers leave time bombs of water behind.

quiz.question: What causes glacial lake outburst floods?
options: Natural dams of ice and rock collapse
